attributes.action: Put sex offenders/paedophiles in with all other con's in prison, DON'T PROTECT THEM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do not let them be segregated in prison to PROTECT THEM! PUT THEM IN WITH THE CONVICTS, (when they eventually get sent down that is!!) If we can't protect ourselves or our children, why should we pay our tax to keep them protected in prison?

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
